text: Abashidze () is a Georgian surname == Notable people with the name == *the house of Abashidze a Georgian princely family *Ana Abashidze, Georgian princess *Aslan Abashidze, Georgian politician, separatist leader in the Ajarian Autonomous Republic in western Georgia *Giorgi-Malakia Abashidze, Georgian nobleman, became king George VI of Imereti *Grigol Abashidze, Georgian poet *Haidar Abashidze, Georgian politician, journalist, and educator *Irakli Abashidze, Georgian poet, literary scholar and politician *Ivane Abashidze, Georgian nobleman, one of the leaders of the 1819 Imeretian Uprising, claimant to the throne of Imereti *Kita Abashidze, Georgian literary critic, journalist, and politician *Levan Abashidze (died 1757), Georgian prince, maternal grandfather of Solomon I of Imereti *Memed Abashidze, Georgian politician, writer and public benefactor *Nunu Abashydze, Ukrainian athlete, bronze medalist for the Soviet Union in 1982 European Athletics Championships *Vaso Abashidze, Georgian theater actor and a founder of a realistic acting tradition in Georgia *Antoni (Abashidze), bishop of the Russian Orthodox Church of Georgian origins, active in Russian, Georgia, Ukraine and Uzbekistan. Category:Georgian-language surnames
title: Abashidze (surname)
